name: Awesome Christmas Holiday Cupcake Bakery - Food Maker
name_original: Awesome Christmas Holiday Cupcake Bakery - Food Maker
description:
Just on time for the holiday celebrations! The holidays aren't the same with tasty, warm, homemade cupcakes!

Celebrate by creating tasty cupcakes with numerous unique flavors and designs!

[Features]
-Make your own cookie batter from scratch!
-Mix N match your flavors and choose your desired cookie shape!
-Set the timer and BAKE!
-Decorate your cupcakes with icing & CANDY!
-Save N share your favorite cupcakes with friends and family!


Perfect game for the holidays! Download now!





[Note]
-This game is free to play but offers in-game transactions made with real money.
